original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchanti …pe….

analyzed: ▁na ▁ukkhitt akāy a ▁ antara ghar e ▁gam issāmīti ▁sikkhā ▁ karaṇīy āti
▁na ▁ukkhitt akāy a ▁ antara ghar e ▁gantabb aṃ

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca ekato vā ubhato vā ukkhipitvā antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁yo ▁anādar iyaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁ekato ▁vā ▁ubhato ▁vā ▁u kkhip itvā ▁ antara ghar e ▁gacchati ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa
